mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home_stadium ( name, team, owner_id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at ) VALUES (#{name}, #{team}, #{ownerId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{deletedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT stadium_id, name, team, owner_id, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM home_stadium WHERE stadium_id = #{stadiumId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update:
UPDATE home_stadium
name = #{name},
team = #{team},
owner_id = #{ownerId},
updated_at = #{updatedAt},
WHERE stadium_id = #{stadiumId}
